source_objects.title: Project Management
source_objects.description: Master Project Management with courses on: PMI RMP, PRINCE Foundation certification, software project management, CBAP, project planning and execution.

items.title: Scheduling Made Easy: How Finish Any Project On Time
items.headline: How to effectively create and manage a project schedule using the critical path method (CPM) for project scheduling.
objectives_summary: Explain why scheduling is a key skill for project management
Understand how to use a Work Breakdown Structure (WBS) to organize a project schedule
Create a Network Logic Diagram to sequence activities

items.title: IASSC Lean Six Sigma Green Belt | 2021 Exam
items.headline: Six Sigma Green Bel exams with real exam questions | Includes July 19, 2021 questions update
objectives_summary: Get a solid experience in Six Sigma and be fully prepared for the IASSC Certified Lean SixSigma Green Belt exam 2021
Feel sure to take IASSC Certified Lean SixSigma Gren Belt exam 2021
Identify the main components necessary to pass the exam
